column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I was satisfied overall with the food
column2: but certainly not blown away.  The stuffed mushrooms were amazing
column3: but everything else kind of meandered around average.  The biggest disappointment for me was the pacing of the meal.  I realize that tapas just comes out as it is ready
column4: but we had almost our entire order come out within just a few minutes of one another.  We blinked
column5: and the meal was over.  If I go back
column6: I would definately hold back my ordering so that I could have a little more control over the pace of the meal.  If 3.5 stars were an option
column7: that would probably fit this place perfectly.
